damage: Strikes with the weapon additionally deal {damage} damage of the weapon's base damage type to creatures of type {creature}.
persistent: Strikes with the weapon cause external or internal bleeding in creatures of type {creature}. Against such creatures, Strikes with the weapon deal {damage} persistent bleed damage.
flavor: You imbue the weapon with energies spawned by your previous defeat of the creatures whose parts reside within it, or from energies anathematic to a certain type of creature, in order to make the weapon particularly effective against a specific type of creature.
